network

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0 The controller is the class that interacts with the user. All the information taken from the user and printed to the user goes through the controller class
    Author:
    Alex Hoecht, Andrew Ward, Mohamed Dahrouj, Shasthra Ranasinghe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      The constructor initializes the lists and scanner needed for the controller

                         java.lang.String startNode,
                         java.lang.String endNode,
                         int hops)
        Parameters:
        msg - The message being sent
        startNode - The node where the message started
        endNode - The final destination of the node
        hops - the number of hops taken by the message
